'"Overcome"' is a song written and performed by Creed. At the time of its
release, it was their first single in seven years, and also the first from their
2009 reunion album, [[Full Circle (Creed album)|Full Circle]]. To date, it's
their 11th song to reach the top 5 on the Hot Mainstream Rock Tracks chart.
http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20274934,00.html The single
was released digitally on August 25, 2009.

The radio world premiere of the full song took place August 18, 2009 at 5:13pm
PDT on Alternative Rock Station KCXX in San Bernardino, California.
